price: Na tulimtia mtihanini Suleiman, na tukauweka mwili juu ya kiti chake, kisha akarejea kwa kutubu.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا عَلَىٰ كُرۡسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدٗا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
footnotes: Na hakika Sisi tulimfanyia mtihani Suleiman ili asighurike na heba ya ufalme. Tukaweka juu ya kiti chake kiwiliwili kisicho weza kuendesha mambo. Akautambua mtihani, akarejea kwa Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu, na akatubu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā sulaymāna wa-alqaynā ʿalā kur'siyyihi jasadan thumma anāba
